attributes.action: No confidence vote on Amber Rudd being home secretary
attributes.additional_details: Also her performance in the referendum debates were awful , she was rude , childish and had no respect for anyone. Not a person to be in public office.
attributes.background: Amber Rudd is not commited to do  the job of home secretary and refuses to do what she is asked , by the goverment and the will of the people ..We demanded no free movement and this what 17.5 million people voted for is being ignored ..Our borders should be shut now! & a leaver take her place
